void iGeom_getArr2ndAdj ( iGeom_Instance  instance,
const iBase_EntityHandle *  entity_handles,
int  entity_handles_size,
int  order_adjacent_key,
int  requested_entity_type,
iBase_EntityHandle **  adj_entity_handles,
int *  adj_entity_handles_allocated,
int *  adj_entity_handles_size,
int **  offset,
int *  offset_allocated,
int *  offset_size,
int *  err 
)

Get "2nd order" adjacencies to an array of entities.

Get "2nd order" adjacencies to an array of entities, that is, from each entity, through other entities of a specified "bridge" dimension, to other entities of another specified "to" dimension.

Parameters:
[in] instance iGeom instance handle
[in] entity_handles Entities from which adjacencies are requested
[in] entity_handles_size Number of entities whose adjacencies are requested
[in] order_adjacent_key Bridge dimension for 2nd order adjacencies
[in] requested_entity_type unknown
[in,out] adj_entity_handles Adjacent entities
[in,out] adj_entity_handles_allocated Allocated size of returned array
[in,out] adj_entity_handles_size Occupied size of returned array
[in,out] offset Offset[i] is offset into adj_entity_handles of 2nd order adjacencies of ith entity in entity_handles
[in,out] offset_allocated Allocated size of offset array
[in,out] offset_size Occupied size of offset array
[out] err Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)
void iGeom_getArrAdj ( iGeom_Instance  instance,
const iBase_EntityHandle *  entity_handles,
int  entity_handles_size,
int  requested_entity_type,
iBase_EntityHandle **  adj_entity_handles,
int *  adj_entity_handles_allocated,
int *  adj_entity_handles_size,
int **  offset,
int *  offset_allocated,
int *  offset_size,
int *  err 
)

Get entities of specified type adjacent to entities.

Get entities of specified type adjacent to entities. Specified type must be value in the iBase_EntityType enumeration. offset(i) is index of first entity in adjacentEntityHandles array adjacent to entity_handles[i].

Parameters:
[in] instance iGeom instance handle
[in] entity_handles Array of entity handles being queried
[in] entity_handles_size Number of entities in entity_handles array
[in] requested_entity_type Type of adjacent entities requested
[in,out] adj_entity_handles Pointer to array of adjacentEntityHandles returned from function
[in,out] adj_entity_handles_allocated Pointer to allocated size of adjacentEntityHandles array
[in,out] adj_entity_handles_size Pointer to occupied size of adjacentEntityHandles array
[in,out] offset Pointer to array of offsets returned from function
[in,out] offset_allocated Pointer to allocated size of offset array
[in,out] offset_size Pointer to occupied size of offset array
[out] err Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)
void iGeom_getEnt2ndAdj ( iGeom_Instance  instance,
iBase_EntityHandle  entity_handle,
int  bridge_dimension,
int  to_dimension,
iBase_EntityHandle **  adjacent_entities,
int *  adjacent_entities_allocated,
int *  adjacent_entities_size,
int *  err 
)

Get "2nd order" adjacencies to an entity.

Get "2nd order" adjacencies to an entity, that is, from an entity, through other entities of a specified "bridge" dimension, to other entities of another specified "to" dimension.

Parameters:
[in] instance iGeom instance handle
[in] entity_handle Entity from which adjacencies are requested
[in] bridge_dimension Bridge dimension for 2nd order adjacencies
[in] to_dimension Dimension of adjacent entities returned
[in,out] adjacent_entities Adjacent entities
[in,out] adjacent_entities_allocated Allocated size of returned array
[in,out] adjacent_entities_size Occupied size of returned array
[out] err Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)
void iGeom_getEntAdj ( iGeom_Instance  instance,
iBase_EntityHandle  entity_handle,
int  to_dimension,
iBase_EntityHandle **  adj_entities,
int *  adj_entities_allocated,
int *  adj_entities_size,
int *  err 
)

Get entities of specified type adjacent to an entity.

Get entities of specified type adjacent to an entity. Specified type must be value in the iBase_EntityType enumeration.

Parameters:
[in] instance iGeom instance handle
[in] entity_handle Entity handle being queried
[in] to_dimension unknown
[in,out] adj_entities Pointer to array of adjacent entities returned from function
[in,out] adj_entities_allocated Pointer to allocated size of adj_entities array
[in,out] adj_entities_size Pointer to occupied size of adj_entities array
[out] err Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)
void iGeom_isArrAdj ( iGeom_Instance  instance,
const iBase_EntityHandle *  entity_handles_1,
int  entity_handles_1_size,
const iBase_EntityHandle *  entity_handles_2,
int  entity_handles_2_size,
int **  is_adjacent_info,
int *  is_adjacent_info_allocated,
int *  is_adjacent_info_size,
int *  err 
)

Return whether entity pairs are adjacent.

Return whether entity pairs are adjacent, i.e. if entity_handles_1[i] is adjacent to entity_handles_2[i]. This function requires entity_handles_1_size and entity_handles_2_size to be equal.

Parameters:
[in] instance iGeom instance handle
[in] entity_handles_1 First array of entities
[in] entity_handles_1_size Number of entities in first array
[in] entity_handles_2 Second array of entities
[in] entity_handles_2_size Number of entities in second array
[in,out] is_adjacent_info Array of flags returned from function
[in,out] is_adjacent_info_allocated Allocated size of flags array
[in,out] is_adjacent_info_size Occupied size of flags array
[out] err Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)
void iGeom_isEntAdj ( iGeom_Instance  instance,
iBase_EntityHandle  entity_handle1,
iBase_EntityHandle  entity_handle2,
int *  are_adjacent,
int *  err 
)

Return whether two entities are adjacent.

Parameters:
[in] instance iGeom instance handle
[in] entity_handle1 First entity queried
[in] entity_handle2 Second entity queried
[out] are_adjacent If returned non-zero, entities are adjacent, otherwise they are not
[out] err Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)
